response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I believe it's worth exploring a mutually beneficial arrangement. Considering the substantial worth of this product to both of us, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This figure aims to reflect the product's true value while leaving room for negotiation and ensuring a fair transaction for all parties involved. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you require additional information to make a decision. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 1200000}
